survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate the effectiveness of networking opportunities provided at the recent conference, to improve future events.

questions.question_text: How satisfied were you with the networking opportunities at the conference?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for clarity. Ensure the options are displayed vertically for mobile users.

script.question_text: How satisfied were you with the networking opportunities at the conference?

questions.question_text: Which networking formats did you participate in? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections. Ensure the 'None of the above' option deselects other choices if selected.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox with logic to deselect other options if 'None of the above' is selected.

script.question_text: Which networking formats did you participate in? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What was the most valuable networking activity for you, and why?
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected any networking format in Q2 except 'None of the above'
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative insights. Limit response to 300 characters.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: open text with character limit.

script.question_text: What was the most valuable networking activity for you, and why?
script.routing_logic: Respondents who selected any networking format in Q2 except 'None of the above'

questions.question_text: How many meaningful professional connections did you make at the conference?
questions.client_notes: Use a categorical scale for ease of response. Ensure options are mutually exclusive.

script.question_text: How many meaningful professional connections did you make at the conference?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for future conference networking opportunities?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather actionable feedback. Limit response to 500 characters.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: open text with character limit.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for future conference networking opportunities?
